alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:32PM MDT until June 29 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... Northern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... Northern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 530 PM MDT/630 PM CDT/. * At 432 PM MDT/532 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Minuteman Missile Visitors Center to 3 miles northeast of Kadoka to 3 miles northwest of Cedar Butte, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Cedar Butte around 540 PM CDT. Belvidere around 445 PM MDT. Philip around 450 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Nowlin and Midland. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 127 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
